title: Toni Erdmann New Clip From Cannes

sources.title: ToniErdmannNewClipFromCannes
sources.description: Toni Erdmann Directed by Maren Ade Germany, 2016 Drama Starring Peter Simonischek, Sandra Hüller, Michael Wittenborn, Thomas Loibl, Trystan Pütter In competition, 162 min Synopsis Winfried doesn’t see much of his working daughter Ines. The suddenly student-less music teacher decides to surprise her with a visit after the death of his old dog. It’s an awkward move because serious career woman Ines is working on an important project as a corporate strategist in Bucharest.
